name: SUN FOUNDATION
briefDescription: PROFILESince its inception in 1998 at the initiative of Padma Shri Vikramjit Singh Sahney, Sun Foundation has been engaged in a number of social welfare activities. It has reached out to those who were incapacitated and has provided support to less-privileged section of society. A few hands joined up and it soon became a community mobilisation campaign. It strived to meet an end that was meant to be an opportunity for lesser privileged to grow and join the mainstream. The Foundation grew ever since not in database but humanness.Sun Foundation ProjectsSave the Girl Child Campaign: The campaign translates the dismay woven around girl child birth in a family to an opportunity to grow and prosper and celebrate her birth.
